content.prompt: Which of the following was a long-term reaction to the actions of the youth addressed in the excerpt?

choices.label: The establishment of organizations to address environmental concerns
The expansion of United States military involvement in Southeast Asia
The rejection of nonviolent tactics by the majority of civil rights groups
The emergence of a conservative backlash against perceived cultural decline

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
